metadata.description: "Decay" delves into the profound concept of transformation and resilience. Within this collection, the figures portrayed are adorned with the raw beauty of decay, where time's relentless touch has left its mark. Each artwork captures the essence of these weathered souls, where weathered textures become intricate narratives of their life's journey. Amidst the fading of outward appearances, these figures exude an inner strength that defies the passage of time. The collection is a testament to the resilience of the human spirit, revealing the profound stories etched within the lines and creases. Through their decayed visages, these figures embody the enduring power of the human soul and inspire us to embrace the beauty found within the complexities of existence.
metadata.name: Faded #1/3
